faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Quick answers to common questions about your sinking fund.
faq.q1: How does a sinking fund work?
faq.a1: Each member contributes regularly to a shared pool. Funds can be used for loans or shared goals, with transparent tracking and fair rules.
faq.q2: Can I request a loan from the group fund?
faq.a2: Yes. You can request a loan based on your contribution history. Group approval or automated limits may apply.
faq.a3: Your contributions are recorded transparently. Fund administrators or smart contracts manage allocations fairly and securely.
faq.q4: Can AI help me plan my savings?
faq.a4: Yes! Our AI assistant can suggest how much to contribute, remind you of due dates, and even simulate your fund’s growth over time.
faq.q5: Can I set a goal for each fund?
faq.a5: Absolutely. You can set target amounts, deadlines, and even visualize your progress with real-time updates.
faq.q6: How do I withdraw my savings?
faq.a6: Withdrawals are based on your share or request type. Some may require admin approval or fund maturity before access.
faq.q7: How do you keep my transactions safe?
faq.a7: We use blockchain technology to secure your transactions. It's like a digital lockbox—transparent, tamper-resistant, and built for trust.
faq.q8: What security measures protect my funds
faq.a8: Your funds are protected using industry-standard encryption, blockchain transparency, and access controls-ensuring only you and authorized users can access them.
